name: .DV2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .DV2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Divinity II players have created utilities that allow them to extract files from and repack DV2 files. The utilities are named dv2_u.exe and dv2_pak.exe.

Those looking to download the utilities are most likely to be able to find them on the XeNTax Game Research Forum. However, users often share the utilities using file-sharing websites that periodically delete hosted files. So, it may be difficult to find a current download link.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
